body:
Comment 3: 
I don't know why you say make fails without any error messages.
You said you see "make exiting".  It never does that without
printing an error.  Sometimes the error is a few lines above.
Look for ***.

I just tried removing /bin/ed and running all.bash and I got

mkenam: line 31: /bin/ed: No such file or directory
make[1]: *** [enam.c] Error 127
make[1]: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs...
... more output

Russ
